game.name: Chernobots
game.categories: Single-player, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Chernobots is a retro 3D roguelite, allowing endless exploration of the dangerous and procedurally generated Chernobyl Exclusion Zone. Search for highly radioactive targets via remote controlled robots to get the job done or pay the price. Are you up for the gig?
